Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.server

Class GameRoom

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP48.server.GameRoom
public class GameRoom
extends java.lang.Object
A game room. It contains the Controller and the Model of the current game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameRoom​(int playersNumber, boolean AllowedDivinities, int ID)
    Initializes a game room object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPlayerInRoom​(java.lang.String name, java.util.Calendar birthday, ViewInterface playerVirtualView)
    Adds a player in the game room
    int getGameRoomID()
    Getter of game room id
    int getPlayersInTheRoom()
    Getter of the players actually in the room
    int getRoomPlayerNumber()
    Getter of the maximum number of players allowed in the match
    boolean isGameWithDivinities()
    Checks if the game is with divinities
    void notifyAllPlayersOfDisconnection​(java.lang.String disconnectedPlayers)
    Notifies all the players in the game room that one player disconnected, and remove from the server the nicknames of all players in the game room
    void notifyAllPlayersOfLoser​(java.lang.String loser)
    Notifies all the players that someone lost the game and the game is ended; the winner is notified of his success, other players are notified of their failure.
    void notifyAllPlayersOfWinner​(java.lang.String winner)
    Notifies all the players that someone won the game; the winner is notified of his success, other players are notified of their failure.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameRoom

      public GameRoom​(int playersNumber, boolean AllowedDivinities, int ID)
      Initializes a game room object
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - the number of players allowed in the game room
      AllowedDivinities - if the match in the game room allows divinities
      ID - the univocal ID of the game room

  • Method Details

    • getRoomPlayerNumber

      public int getRoomPlayerNumber()
      Getter of the maximum number of players allowed in the match
      Returns:
      the maximum number of player allowed in this room

    • getPlayersInTheRoom

      public int getPlayersInTheRoom()
      Getter of the players actually in the room
      Returns:
      the number of players actually in the room

    • isGameWithDivinities

      public boolean isGameWithDivinities()
      Checks if the game is with divinities
      Returns:
      true if the room contains a game with divinities, false otherwise

    • addPlayerInRoom

      public void addPlayerInRoom​(java.lang.String name, java.util.Calendar birthday, ViewInterface playerVirtualView)
      Adds a player in the game room
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player to be added
      birthday - the birthday of the player
      playerVirtualView - the virtualview of the player

    • getGameRoomID

      public int getGameRoomID()
      Getter of game room id
      Returns:
      the ID of the game room

    • notifyAllPlayersOfDisconnection

      public void notifyAllPlayersOfDisconnection​(java.lang.String disconnectedPlayers)
      Notifies all the players in the game room that one player disconnected, and remove from the server the nicknames of all players in the game room
      Parameters:
      disconnectedPlayers - the player that disconnected from the server

    • notifyAllPlayersOfWinner

      public void notifyAllPlayersOfWinner​(java.lang.String winner)
      Notifies all the players that someone won the game; the winner is notified of his success, other players are notified of their failure. In the end, free all game room players' nickname from the server
      Parameters:
      winner - the player that won the game

    • notifyAllPlayersOfLoser

      public void notifyAllPlayersOfLoser​(java.lang.String loser)
      Notifies all the players that someone lost the game and the game is ended; the winner is notified of his success, other players are notified of their failure. In the end, free all game room players' nickname from the server
      Parameters:
      loser - the player that lost the game
